title: Vacation Time!
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 595 words, Level M (Grade 2), Lexile 550L, Fiction Series
description: In this sixth installment in the Hoppers series, the rabbits are ready to spend their vacation money. After a brief setback when Snubby Nose loses his money, the Hoppers hop aboard a train for a ride. But when the train goes through a tunnel, scaring all four little Hoppers, Grandpa Grizzly must come to the rescue with head-lamps and chocolate treats
meta: aboard, countryside, disappeared, explosion, platform, vacation
Use the reading strategy of connecting to prior knowledge to understand text
Vowel Digraphs : Fluently read the long /a/ vowel digraph ai
Verb Endings : Recognize and understand the formation of past-tense verbs ending in -ed
Compound Words : Identify common compound words
